description.ko: 거대한 단일 구조물이 디지털 글리치 파편으로 끊임없이 부서지는 기하학적 추상의 강렬한 탐구입니다.
description.en: A stark exploration of geometric abstraction where a monolithic structure is perpetually breaking apart into digital glitch fragments.

prompt: A massive, brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian monolith suspended in a stark #FFFFFF digital void, caught in a state of perpetual geometric collapse. The structure shatters into a recursive torrent of sharp #808080 shards and vertical #C0C0C0 scanline glitches. High-contrast monochrome complexity with deep digital noise textures and raytraced reflections on the fragmented black glass surfaces. 8k resolution, Octane Render, razor-sharp shadows emphasizing chaos within order and the perfect balance of a disintegrating reality.
